title: Modern Font
content:
Could you help me with this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_5475.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6a00e54ef964538834016766efbce1970b-800wi_4711.jpg)

Font: 

 Alston 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Gaizka

comments.content:
That's [Alston](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/mirkoborsche.com/projects/049-2012-tush-typeface/05_2012_tush_fonts_bbweb.jpg), exclusive typeface for Tush Magazine, commissioned by [Bureau Mirko Borsche](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/mirkoborsche.com/?q=alston) and designed by [Colophon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/).  
Alternatives: [Romana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/romana), [Fortescue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/fortescue), [De Vinne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072647/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/de+vinne)
Thank you very much Ryuk for such detailed information.
